item.title: Straight Outta Moabit Berlin Germany Neighborhood White Design
item.description: Moabit is a locality in the borough of Berlin Mitte with borders defined by 3 watercourses: the Spree river, the Westhafen Canal and the Berlin-Spandau Ship Canal. A cool design for people who want to show their love for Berlin Moabit. • Millions of unique designs by independent artists. Find your thing.

item.title: Kreuzberg 61 - Berlin Germany Neighborhood Nostalgia Black Design
item.description: This design shows “Kreuzberg” and a large number 61 in a college style font. Until 1993 Germany used a 4 digit post code. Berlin was 1000 and part of the district Kreuzberg was 61, a neighborhood known for its punk and alternative scenes. It is for people who have lived or stayed in Berlin Kreuzberg and hopefully have good memories worth being nostalgic about. • Also buy this artwork on apparel, stickers, phone cases, and more.

item.title: Panke Is Not Dead Funny Berlin River Punk Text Design
item.description: The Panke is a small river that flows from Bernau in Brandenburg through Pankow, Gesundbrunnen, Wedding and Mitte into the Berlin-Spandau Ship Canal and the Spree. This funny wordplay design shows the text “PANKE IS NOT DEAD” in a punk style distressed font. It is for people who love punk rock and the Panke river. • Also buy this artwork on apparel, stickers, phone cases, and more.

item.title: Straight Outta Kreuzberg Berlin Punk Neighborhood Black Design
item.description: Kreuzberg, a.k.a. X-Berg, is a famous district of Berlin that emerged from one of the poorest quarters in the late 1970s to one of Berlin’s cultural centers, known world wide for its alternative scene and counterculture. A cool design for people who are from Berlin Kreuzberg, have lived there or simply love this unique part of Berlin, Germany. • Also buy this artwork on apparel, stickers, phone cases, and more.

item.title: Straight Outta Wedding Berlin Germany Neighborhood White Design
item.description: Der Wedding is a locality in the borough of Berlin Mitte. Traditionally associated with the working class, it has become home for people with many cultural backgrounds, who make Wedding a vibrant and special place in Berlin. A cool design for people who want to show their love for Berlin Wedding. • Also buy this artwork on apparel, phone cases, home decor, and more.
